comments:
Create a new EAR by selecting File > New > Other > J2EE > Enterprise
Application  

Press Next
Press New Modules... To create new modules if you need some modules & finish
the New Modules Wizard.
Select the modules you want to add and press Finish.  

Now do this agian:

Press New Modules... Pick the defaults again - and null pointers are thrown.
